00022 #include "AlohaMacLayer.h"
00023 
00024 #include <iostream>
00025 
00026 #include "UWBIRMacPkt_m.h"
00027 #include "UWBIRMacPkt.h"
00028 #include "MacToPhyInterface.h"
00029 
00030 using namespace std;
00031 
00032 Define_Module(AlohaMacLayer);
00033 
00034 void AlohaMacLayer::initialize(int stage) {
00035   UWBIRMac::initialize(stage);
00036   if(stage == 1 && myMacAddr != LAddress::L2NULL) {
00037             phy->setRadioState(Radio::TX);
00038     } else if(stage == 1 && myMacAddr == LAddress::L2NULL) {
00039             phy->setRadioState(Radio::RX);
00040     }
00041 }
00042 
00043 void AlohaMacLayer::finish() {
00044     if(stats) {
00045         recordScalar("Erroneous bits", errRxBits);
00046         recordScalar("Total received bits", totalRxBits);
00047         recordScalar("Average BER", errRxBits/totalRxBits);
00048         recordScalar("nbReceivedPacketsRS", nbReceivedPacketsRS);
00049         recordScalar("nbReceivedPacketsnoRS", nbReceivedPacketsNoRS);
00050         if(rsDecoder) {
00051           recordScalar("nbReceivedPackets", nbReceivedPacketsRS);
00052         } else {
00053           recordScalar("nbReceivedPackets", nbReceivedPacketsNoRS);
00054         }
00055 
00056         recordScalar("nbSentPackets", nbSentPackets);
00057     }
00058 }
00059 
00060 MacPkt* AlohaMacLayer::encapsMsg(cPacket *msg) {
00061     UWBIRMacPkt* encaps = new UWBIRMacPkt(msg->getName(), msg->getKind());
00062     encaps->setByteLength(headerLength);
00063 
00064     // copy dest address from the Control Info attached to the network
00065     // mesage by the network layer
00066     cObject *const cInfo = msg->removeControlInfo();
00067 
00068     debugEV <<"CInfo removed, mac addr="<< getUpperDestinationFromControlInfo(cInfo) << endl;
00069     encaps->setDestAddr(getUpperDestinationFromControlInfo(cInfo));
00070 
00071     //delete the control info
00072     delete cInfo;
00073 
00074     //set the src address to own mac address
00075     encaps->setSrcAddr(myMacAddr);
00076 
00077     //encapsulate the network packet
00078     encaps->encapsulate(msg);
00079 
00080     prepareData(encaps);
00081 
00082     nbSentPackets++;
00083 
00084   return encaps;
00085 }
00086 
00087 /*
00088 void AlohaMacLayer::handleUpperMsg(cMessage *msg) {
00089     MacPkt* packet = encapsMsg(msg);
00090 
00091 }
00092 */
00093 void AlohaMacLayer::handleLowerMsg(cMessage *msg) {
00094     UWBIRMacPkt *mac = static_cast<UWBIRMacPkt *>(msg);
00095 
00096     if(validatePacket(mac)) {
00097         const LAddress::L2Type& dest = mac->getDestAddr();
00098         const LAddress::L2Type& src  = mac->getSrcAddr();
00099         if ((dest == myMacAddr)) {
00100           debugEV << "message with mac addr " << src
00101                     << " for me (dest=" << dest
00102                     << ") -> forward packet to upper layer" << std::endl;
00103             sendUp(decapsMsg(mac));
00104         } else {
00105           debugEV << "message with mac addr " << src
00106                     << " not for me (dest=" << dest
00107                     << ") -> delete (my MAC=" << myMacAddr << ")" << std::endl;
00108             delete mac;
00109         }
00110     } else {
00111       debugEV << "Errors in message ; dropping mac packet." << std::endl;
00112         delete mac;
00113     }
00114 }
